line_1: For she is mine — my Doris! — O suspend —
line_2: O say no more — no more of her, my friend;

line_1: Critics, though stern, awhile their voice suspend,
line_2: Till, charm'd by Siddons, at her shrine they bend;

line_1: Each curious, each important search suspend,
line_2: Should he, of sciences the moral friend,

line_1: AS when two Scales, which equal Loads suspend,
line_2: Sway to and fro; alternate both descend,

line_1: Three lamps the chains suspend,
line_2: Their value and their end.

line_1: And in her grove the vocal reeds suspend
line_2: She bids it injured innocence befriend;

line_1: Awhile the softly-falling tear suspend:
line_2: Yet Thou, his mistress once, and late his friend,

line_1: Some o'er their heads the canopy suspend,
line_2: Ambrosial showers and balmy juices blend,

line_1: Even Philomel thy Note suspend,
line_2: And to a sweeter Song attend;

line_1: Firm to his rock with silver cords suspend
line_2: The anchor'd Pinna, and his Cancer-friend;

line_1: From arm to arm in gay festoons suspend
line_2: Her fragrant flowers, her graceful foliage bend;

line_1: Ye birds awhile your notes suspend;
line_2: Let earth and seas, and winds attend;

line_1: But long, O long th' inglorious doom suspend!
line_2: What virtue gain'd may virtue still defend!

line_1: Long, long on her my dying eyes suspend,
line_2: Then soar where only greater joys attend,

line_1: Say, why my joys suspend!
line_2: Say, why! my noble friend!

line_1: The action of the stronger to suspend,
line_2: Reason still use, to Reason still attend:

line_1: The village children now their games suspend,
line_2: To see the bier that bears their ancient friend:

line_1: Let us awhile the war suspend,
line_2: And reason as from friend to friend.

line_1: Nor for a wretch like me the storm suspend.
line_2: The mountain shake, the howling forest rend;

line_1: Ye croaking rooks your noisy flight suspend,
line_2: Guess'd I not right how all my toil would end?

line_1: Judgment a moment I suspend,
line_2: To reason as from friend to friend.

line_1: Where Life and Death the equal Scale suspend,
line_2: New Beings rising as the former end.
